auth.accountNotFoundEmail: There’s no account found with this email address.
auth.accountNotFoundPhone: There’s no account found with this phone number.
auth.userNotAllowed: You are unable to access this platform.
auth.OTPSendSuccessfully: OTP is sent to your Email and mobile number.
auth.EmailOTPSendSuccessfully: OTP is sent to your Email.
auth.invalidOTP: Invalid OTP entered. Please try again.
auth.duplicateClient: A client with the same name already exists.
auth.duplicateDomain: A client with the same domain already exists.
auth.forbidden: You are not authorized to access this platform
auth.commonError: Internal Server Error. Something went wrong at Server side
auth.clientOTP: Check Your Email and mobile number For OTP
auth.oauthActivationError: There is some problem try other Authentication method
auth.notAccessChangePassword: You can't change password because you logged-in with social account.
auth.accountDeactivated: You can't perform this action as your account is deactivated
